fullText:
Infernal Warrior

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, Cha 17, tiefling, any martial class
Benefit: When an enemy scores a critical hit against you, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against that enemy as a free action, even if you have already used the power this encounter.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 147.
name: Infernal Warrior
